message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200.  I think you'll find it's a great value at this price.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could go down to $180, but I can't go any lower than that. It's a very high-quality product.
Hi Alice, I understand the product is high-quality, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $150?
